bugs.summary: Migrate existing wiki page to `mots.yaml`
Update libyuv
Support audio playback via Windows Media Foundation Media Engine API
Implement COEP: credentialless
Support structured cloning of Error stacks
Make browser_test_shentry_wireframe.js work with parent controlled loads
Update toolkit/components/passwordmgr/test/browser test files to use https
eval is still allowed in JSMs
Consider making fullscreen modal (preventing interaction with the rest of the page like modal dialogs do)
Problem with navigation with keyboard use - Accesibility
Make native color layers active for YouTube fullscreen video
Printing a PDF as Save to PDF produces rasterized output
The entire screen sometimes freezes when moving tabs to another window
When d3d11 debug layer pref enabled, we should also ask for a debug IDXGIFactory
WebGL never uses Dmabuf any more
Add more crash annotations for bug 1772839
UploadTexturePool::end_frame is susceptible to subtraction overflow
Remove clip-node references from wrench
Remove per-item complex clips in wrench in favor of explicit clip-chains
ipc/chromium: Replace some DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN macros with explicitly deleted constructors to fix C++20 build errors
[Shadow Realms] Expose Web APIs
Shell only implementation of ShadowRealms
Rename groupBy* to group*
Call SetAcquiringImportMaps(false) when fetching a modulepreload module script graph
Remove locking on lazy linking
Add frame pointer to RegExp stubs
Update Zydis to version 3.2.1
Remove two ReflowInput::ApplyRelativePositioning methods that require ReflowInput instance
Early hint telemetry
Avoid including SimpleTest.js directly from APZ test helpers
PDF from Google Docs prints out with little artifacts (rasterized text?)
Pasted objects in pdf.js editor are sometimes empty or show rendering artifacts
Add a more explicit assertion in NS_CycleCollectorSuspect3()
Frequent intermitent  devtools/client/webconsole/test/browser/browser_console_enable_network_monitoring.js when Gecko 103 merges to Beta on 2022-06-27
Avoid updating CodeMirror unless it is strictly necessary
Reduce number of state updates related to symbols
Avoid unecessary updates to the first selected frame
Avoid unnecessary updates to DebugLine when the source text is loading.
Longer localization for the buffer settings strings in about:profiling shrinks the range slider
Implement Merino session IDs
Clarify the autofill telemetry documentation
PDF attachments in gmail open in a new tab when clicking on the download icon that appears when hovering over the attachment.
Perma browser/base/content/test/performance/browser_startup_content.js | all known modules scripts should have been loaded - Got 1, expected +0 when Gecko 103 merges to Beta on 2022-06-27
Re-enable some passing browser-chrome tests
finalize new private browsing mode strings & icon
New private tab transferred under normal window.
Pin Firefox to the Windows taskbar during install for all Windows versions (i.e., add Windows 10 and 11)
Add controls for recent article visibility

Update private browsing indicator to include a label
Use real support.m.o URLs in sync setup steps in Firefox View
Intermittent TV browser/base/content/test/general/browser_bug462289.js | Focus is now on Home button - Got "", expected "home-button"
Add preview image for Colorways card in about:addons
Active tab no longer shows a selection outline when selecting multiple tabs
Detect chrome script with .js by ChromeUtils uses
Verify that the paths in ThirdPartyPaths.txt exist before adding them to ThirdPartyPaths.cpp
Perma toolchains clang-trunk-stage1 AssertionError assert r == 0 after 1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to file compiler-rt/cmake/Modules/CompilerRTDarwinUtils.cmake.rej
Agi's farewell docs

Add component classification for IOUtils, PathUtils to dom/system/moz.build
Remove the `security.insecure_field_warning.contextual.enabled` pref
Expose the main source of a recommendation from the snapshot selector
